activateZone(uint16).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by mightyCreator

decreaseTotalCultists(address,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

epoch().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

increaseTotalCultists(address,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

init(uint256).details: Called by factory contract which creates current instance

newAssetSettlement(uint256,uint32,string.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

params.ownerTokenId: Banners token id which will represent to which settlement will be attached to
params.performAttachmentValidation: Whether is to perform attachment validation or not (CULTISTS or restored BASIC may not be attached to anything)

newSettlement(uint32,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Bless tokens will be deducted from msg.sender

params.ownerTokenId: Banners token id which will represent to which settlement will be attached to

restoreSettlement(uint32).details: Any address can restore user settlement

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

settlements.details: Updated when new settlement is created

NewProsperity(address).notice: Emitted when epoch prosperity is created

NewResource(address,string).notice: Emitted when epoch resource is created

NewTileCapturingSystem(address).notice: Emitted when epoch tile capturing system is created

NewUnits(address,string).notice: Emitted when epoch units is created

NewWorkers(address).notice: Emitted when epoch workers is created

resources(string).notice: Mapping containing game resources by name

restoreSettlement(uint32).notice: Restores settlement from previous epoch by provided position

settlements(uint32).notice: Mapping containing settlement by provided x and y coordinates

userSettlements(uint256).notice: Mapping containing settlement address by provided banner id

zones(uint256).notice: An array of attached zones to the continent
